item.description:
The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at The Study Hotel in New Haven on Thursday, April 2, 2009. The event is from 5:30 PM â€“ 8:00 PM. The event will be in the Heirloom Restaurant and will be providing drink specials and free appetizers. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials and Free Food: The Study will be providing free beer and wine for the 1st hour and drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening. The Study will also be providing free appetizers to all attendees.

Your contact for this event is NHC'er Josh, who can be reached at 203-772-0070
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour
